instructions.instruction-1: Players take turns placing X and O on the 3x3 grid
instructions.instruction-2: First player to get 3 in a row (horizontal, vertical, or diagonal) wins
instructions.instruction-3: If all squares are filled with no winner, it's a draw

titleContainer.gameSubtitle: Find all matching pairs of cards

instructions.instruction-4: Choose single round for quick games or best-of series for longer matches
instructions.instruction-5: Build win streaks to improve your stats!

titleContainer.gameSubtitle: Find all matching pairs of cards

instructions.instruction-1: Click on cards to flip them over and reveal the emoji
instructions.instruction-3: You can only flip 2 cards at a time
instructions.instruction-4: Complete the game by matching all pairs
instructions.instruction-5: Score is based on moves and time - fewer is better!
